process.name: Test Process 01
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_7</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_2" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:scriptTask id="node_3" name="Script Task 1" pm:scriptRef="6">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_7</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_8</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:scriptTask>
    <bpmn:scriptTask id="node_5" name="Script Task 2" pm:scriptRef="7">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_9</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_10</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:scriptTask>
    <bpmn:task id="node_4" name="Human Task 1" pm:screenRef="9">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_8</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_9</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:task id="node_6" name="Human Task 2" pm:screenRef="10">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_10</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_7" name="New Sequence Flow" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_3" pm:startEvent=""/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_8" name="New Sequence Flow" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_4" pm:startEvent=""/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_9" name="New Sequence Flow" sourceRef="node_4" targetRef="node_5" pm:startEvent=""/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_10" name="New Sequence Flow" sourceRef="node_5" targetRef="node_6" pm:startEvent=""/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" name="New Sequence Flow" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_2" pm:startEvent=""/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="80" y="100" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="890" y="210" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="180" y="210" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <dc:Bounds x="610" y="210" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <dc:Bounds x="380" y="310" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
        <dc:Bounds x="730" y="320" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_7_di" bpmnElement="node_7">
        <di:waypoint x="116" y="118"/>
        <di:waypoint x="158" y="118"/>
        <di:waypoint x="158" y="248"/>
        <di:waypoint x="180" y="248"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <di:waypoint x="296" y="248"/>
        <di:waypoint x="358" y="248"/>
        <di:waypoint x="358" y="348"/>
        <di:waypoint x="380" y="348"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_9_di" bpmnElement="node_9">
        <di:waypoint x="496" y="348"/>
        <di:waypoint x="588" y="348"/>
        <di:waypoint x="588" y="248"/>
        <di:waypoint x="610" y="248"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <di:waypoint x="726" y="248"/>
        <di:waypoint x="788" y="248"/>
        <di:waypoint x="788" y="320"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <di:waypoint x="846" y="358"/>
        <di:waypoint x="908" y="358"/>
        <di:waypoint x="908" y="246"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

GetRecord.description: Collection get record by record id

scripts.title: Email Send
scripts.code:
<?php

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Exception\ServerException;

// Rest client
$client = new Client([
    'base_uri' => getenv('HOST_URL'),
    'verify' => false,
    'defaults' => ['verify' => false]
    ]);

try {
    // Call to send an email
    $response = $client->request('POST', '/plugins/email/send', [
        'form_params' => [
            'email' => $config['email'],
            'name' => $config['targetName'],
            'subject' => $config['subject'],
            'screenRef' => $config['screenRef'],
            'users' => $config['users'],
            'groups' => $config['groups'],
            'addEmails' => $config['addEmails'],
            'type' => $config['type'],
            'textBody' => $config['textBody'],
            'json_data' => json_encode($data),
            'requestRecipients' => 
                isset($config['requestRecipients']) ? $config['requestRecipients'] : []
        ]
    ]);
} catch(ServerException $e) {
    throw new \Exception($e->getBody());
}

return [];
